CustomField.description: This field is used to prevent someone from using an outdated meter read date from a previous year. Meter reading schedules are update each year. Do not use an inactive schedule to predict a current year's readings.
CustomField.formula: if( AND( TODAY()>= January_Meter_Read_Date__c, TODAY()>= December_Meter_Read_Date__c, ISBLANK(December_Meter_Read_Date__c )=false)=true,"INACTIVE","ACTIVE")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field is used to prevent someone from using an outdated meter read date from a previous year. Meter reading schedules are update each year. Do not use an inactive schedule to predict a current year's readings.
CustomField.label: Schedule Status
